body: Dan from China Law Blog opens a debate with CNBC's Columnist Shaun Rein, who enjoys representing Chinese point of view and recently wrote an article on "Why A Fast Appreciating Yuan Won't Help US Economy."
original_body: Dan from China Law Blog opens a debate with CNBC's Columnist Shaun Rein, who enjoys representing Chinese point of view and recently wrote an article on "Why A Fast Appreciating Yuan Won't Help US Economy."
title: China: Debating with Shaun Rein
